mapper.select: select b.teamName, a.ground from homeGround a, team b where b.teamCode=a.teamCode

select to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as today, a.*, b.teamName as team1, c.teamName as team2 from gameRecord a, team b, team c where to_char(gameDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and a.teamCode=b.teamCode and a.teamCode2=c.teamCode
